commit.message: Use upstream cranelift cargo git dependency instead of my submodule

files.patch:
@@ -53,11 +53,6 @@ dependencies = [
  "libc 0.2.42 (registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index)",
 ]
 
-[[package]]
-name = "bitflags"
-version = "0.7.0"
-source = "registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index"
-
 [[package]]
 name = "bitflags"
 version = "1.0.3"
